Question.#text: Do you have information about Nutritional Support

QAPair.Answer: Summary : Nutritional support is therapy for people who cannot get enough nourishment by eating or drinking. You may need it if you        - Can't swallow    - Have problems with your appetite    - Are severely malnourished    - Can't absorb nutrients through your digestive system       You receive nutritional support through a needle or catheter placed in your vein or with a feeding tube, which goes into your stomach.
